chapter.text: Qasam ʙa osmon, ki dorandai ʙurchost
va qasam ʙa ruzi mav'ud
va qasam ʙa sohididihanda va on ci ʙa on sohidi dihand
ki sohiʙoni uhdud ʙa halokat rasidand
Otase afruxta az hezumho
on goh ki ʙar kanori on otas nisasta ʙudand
va ʙar on ci ʙar sari mu'minon meovarand, sohid ʙudand
Va hec ajʙe dar onho najoftand, cuz on ki ʙa Xudoi ƣoliʙi loiqi sitois imon ovarda ʙudand
on Xudoe, ki farmonravoii osmonhovu zamin az oni Ust va ʙar har cize nozir ast
Alʙatta onon, ki mardonu zanoni mu'minro sikanca kardand va tavʙa nakardand, azoʙi cahannam va azoʙi otas ʙaroi onhost
Baroi kasone, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista kardaand, ʙihisthoest, ki dar on nahrho corist va on komjoʙii ʙuzurgest
Ba azoʙ giriftani Parvardigori tu saxt ast
Ust, ki naxust meofarinad va pas az marg zinda mesozad
U ʙaxsojandavu dustdoranda ast
Ust sohiʙi arsi ʙuzurg
Har ciro iroda kunad, ʙa ancom merasonad
Ojo dostoni laskarhoro sunidai
Laskarhoi Fir'avnu qavmi Samud
Ore, onon, ki rohi kufr pes giriftaand, hamcunon dar duruƣʙarori hastand
va Xudo az hama su ʙar onho ihota dorad
Bale, in Qur'oni macid ast
dar lavhi mahfuz
